roasts.name: Kalle Peaberry
roasts.tasting_notes: Nutty, caramel. Full body. Sweet tea aftertaste, caramel crunch. Cookie spice aroma. Cery deliicous. So nutty. So sweet. Not so chocolatey. Drinkable.

roasts.name: (413) Espresso
roasts.tasting_notes: Lightly fruity, with chocolate finish. Bright, lively, but not sour. Some nuttiness, some butter. Coffee grounds finish. Great contrast to the Gold. New-school-ish but not overblown. I like this roaster a lot!

roasts.name: Gold Espresso
roasts.tasting_notes: Medium body, long milk chocolatey finish, bright, nutty, caramel Monsooned Malabar flavors. Savory, peppery, clean. Not as similar to Josuma's "Malabar Gold" as I expected from the naming and origins. More like "what if Josuma, but a lighter roast?" I think I like (413) and Josuma better, but I wouldn't turn down a shot. Skillfully roasted. Barrington has impressed me.
